src:
Seharian Merah, IHSG Ditutup di Level 6.180
04 Nov 2019, 09:49 by Fadhly Fauzi Rachman


Foto: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - Indeks Harga Saham Gabungan (IHSG) berada di zona negatif siang ini. IHSG melemah ke zona merah hingga penutupan perdagangan.Nilai tukar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS) terhadap rupiah siang ini berada di level Rp 14.010.Pada pra perdagangan, IHSG naik 11 poin (0,19%) ke 6.219. Indeks LQ45 naik 2,9 poin (0,30%) ke 983.Membuka perdagangan Senin (4/11/2019), IHSG terus naik 21 poin (0,36%) ke level 6.228. Indeks LQ45 naik 4,0 (0,52%) poin ke 985.Jeda siang, IHSG melemah 12,4 poin (0,20%) ke 6.194. Indeks LQ45 juga keok 0,7 poin (0,08%) ke 979.IHSG terus melemah hingga perdagangan sore hari ini. IHSG turun 26 poin (0,43%) ke 6.180. Sementara indeks LQ45 turun 26 poin ke level 976,172.Bursa Asia siang ini bergerak di zona hijau, berikut pergerakannya:Indeks Nikkei 225 liburIndeks Hang Seng bertambah 446 poin ke 27.547Indeks Shanghai naik 17 poin ke 2.975Indeks Strait Times menguat 6,9 poin ke 3.236Simak Video "Dolar Tembus Rp 14.200 "[Gambas:Video 20detik](fdl/fdl)
text:
Red Day, JCI Closed at Level 6,180
Nov 04 2019, 09:49 by Fadhly Fauzi Rachman


Photo: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - The Composite Stock Price Index (CSPI) is in the negative zone this afternoon. JCI weakened into the red zone until the close of trade. The exchange rate of the United States dollar (US) against the rupiah this afternoon was at the level of Rp 14,010. In pre-trade, CSPI rose 11 points (0.19%) to 6,219. The LQ45 index rose 2.9 points (0.30%) to 983. Opened trading Monday (11/04/2019), the JCI continued to rise 21 points (0.36%) to 6,228. The LQ45 index rose 4.0 (0.52%) points to 985. In the afternoon break, the Jakarta Composite Index fell 12.4 points (0.20%) to 6,194. The LQ45 index also fell 0.7 points (0.08%) to 979. IHSG continued to weaken until afternoon trading today. JCI dropped 26 points (0.43%) to 6,180. While the LQ45 index fell 26 points to 976,172. The Asian Stock Exchange moved in the green zone this afternoon, following its movements: Nikkei 225 holiday Hang Seng Index added 446 points to 27,547 Shanghai Index rose 17 points to 2,975 Strait Times Index rose 6.9 points to 3,236 Check out the video "Dollar Penetrate Rp. 14,200" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (fdl / fdl)
